sentences.english: Take in the breathtaking scenery around Queenstown before flying home from Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 享受了昆斯敦市的絕佳美景後再由基督城乘飛機回家。

sentences.english: Why do you want to study at Christchurch College of Education?
sentences.chinese: 請問您爲什麼要到新西蘭的基督城師範學院學習？

sentences.english: Christchurch airport was closed and The Press building, a center for newspapers, was badly damaged.
sentences.chinese: 基督城機場已經關閉，新聞大廈也受到嚴重損毀。

sentences.english: Economic activity has been significantly disrupted by the Christchurch earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 由於基督城地震，經濟活動被顯著地干擾。

sentences.english: The sun sets over the Islington substation in Christchurch, New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 落日的餘暉籠罩着新西蘭基督城的伊斯靈頓變電站。

sentences.english: In saying, if he ask, that it was south of the Christchurch road.
sentences.chinese: 在敘述中，如果他問，它是基督城道路南方。

sentences.english: Christchurch Airport has reopened and operations have recommenced.
sentences.chinese: 基督城機場已經重新開放。

sentences.english: Right on time, after four hours and 21 minutes, we drew into Christchurch station.
sentences.chinese: 四小時21分鐘之後，我們準點到達基督城火車站。

sentences.english: No explosives were found on the plane, which was on a flight from Blenheim to Christchurch.
sentences.chinese: 在這架從布倫亨飛往基督城的飛機上沒有發現爆炸物。

definition: Sydney, capital of New South Wales, Australia
Adelaide, capital of South Australia/also written 阿德萊德|阿德莱德
